119.movie_plot: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his succesful rival's girlfriend.

111.movie_plot: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

117.movie_plot: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

118.movie_plot: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.

123.movie_plot: Vicenarian Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss. Excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

99.movie_plot: A crew in Antarctica finds a neighboring camp destroyed and its crew dead. Whatever killed them is nowhere to be found, unless it's hidden in plain sight.

128.movie_plot: A survivor of a supersoldier project must fight his former comrades as a masked hero.

125.movie_plot: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

102.movie_plot: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

121.movie_plot: With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

129.movie_plot: Cody, a little girl abandoned by her mother and raised by her aunt, a nurse, is kidnapped. The girl's guardian, aided by an F.B.I. Agent, learn that Cody has supernatural abilities, and the abductees are a Satanic cult wanting to harness her abilities.

108.movie_name: Man with the Golden Gun, The (1974)

124.movie_name: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai (1999)
124.movie_plot: An African American mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

100.movie_plot: A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.

112.movie_plot: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, a new Ghostface begins to terrorize them once again.

110.movie_plot: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

103.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

109.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

107.movie_plot: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. Agent, whose lover he killed.

104.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

113.movie_plot: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

130.movie_plot: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

116.movie_plot: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

105.movie_plot: James Bond heads to The Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by SPECTRE agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

126.movie_plot: After assuming his dead cellmate's identity to get with his girlfriend, an ex-con finds himself the reluctant participant in a casino heist.

131.movie_plot: Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family.

78.movie_plot: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

62.movie_plot: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

23.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

75.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

46.movie_plot: Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his father, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.

5.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
5.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

27.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

8.movie_plot: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

54.movie_plot: A former L.A. drug dealer tries to go straight but his past and his underworld connections bring him into the focus of the DEA, the Mexican feds and the Mexican drug cartels.

24.movie_plot: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

94.movie_plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

65.movie_plot: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

58.movie_plot: Embarrassed by his large nose, a romantic poet/soldier romances his cousin by proxy.

89.movie_plot: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

17.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

57.movie_plot: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.
